lyric:
[00:00.000] 作词 : Feng Haining
[00:01.000] 作曲 : Feng Haining
[00:13.442]Pull Up, 6:00 p.m.
[00:16.946]See the sunlight Gliding down the hills
[00:19.952]You ask me when it  ends,
[00:23.192]Don’t know the answer and maybe I never will
[00:27.192]Are we waiting for meaning, or were we only in it for the thrills
[00:33.201]But this is not so thrilling,
[00:34.701]don’t you wish we had a few more pills
[00:38.707]Didn’t mean to go this far
[00:41.958]Driving in your car
[00:44.943]Down Sunset Blvd.
[00:50.698]This is when we should depart
[00:54.443]But I can’t say the words
[01:00.192]and you can’t play the part
[01:01.957]So the night keeps going
[01:05.198]The night keeps going
[01:10.202]The night keeps going
[01:13.443]The night keeps going
[01:16.948]The night keeps going
[01:20.193]The night keeps going
[01:23.706]The night keeps going
[01:31.200]The night keeps going
[01:34.192]Last Call, 2:00 a.m.
[01:37.442]Funny how we never even left your car
[01:40.446]Palm trees, Motel Lights
[01:44.444]Paint the skyline down the Blvd
[01:47.447]Like a Invitation
[01:50.454]Silence tells me all I need to know
[01:53.442]Yeah we got no direction
[01:56.952]But we understand where we need to go
[01:59.692]Didn’t mean to go this far
[02:02.443]Driving in your car
[02:07.443]Down Sunset Blvd.
[02:10.952]This is when we should depart
[02:14.693]But I can’t say the words and you can’t play the part
[02:21.877]So the night keeps going
[02:25.138]The night keeps going
[02:29.137]The night keeps going
[02:31.629]The night keeps going
[02:35.628]So the night keeps going
[02:40.878]The night keeps going
[02:44.386]The night keeps going
[03:07.628]The night keeps going
